api.name: NavigationBarPlugin
api.docs: Capacitor Navigation Bar Plugin for customizing the Android navigation bar.

methods.name: setNavigationBarColor
methods.signature: (options: { color: NavigationBarColor | string; darkButtons?: boolean; }) => Promise<void>

tags.name: param
tags.text: options - Configuration for navigation bar appearance

tags.name: returns
tags.text: Promise that resolves when the color is set

tags.name: throws
tags.text: Error if setting the color fails

tags.name: example

methods.docs: Set the navigation bar color and button theme.

methods.name: getNavigationBarColor

tags.name: returns
tags.text: Promise that resolves with the current navigation bar configuration

tags.name: throws
tags.text: Error if getting the color fails

tags.name: example

methods.docs: Get the current navigation bar color and button theme.

methods.name: getPluginVersion

tags.name: returns
tags.text: Promise that resolves with the plugin version

tags.name: throws
tags.text: Error if getting the version fails

tags.name: example

methods.docs: Get the native Capacitor plugin version.
